DOC.brief_summary: Investigators hypothesize that Immunoglobine (Ig) production is influenced by the microbiota of the gut. Investigators will compare microbiota-dependent Ig production in the bronchoalveolar lavage fluid of patients with and without antibiotic therapy in order to detect significant differences.
DOC.brief_title: Comparison of IgA Levels in the Bronchoalveolar Lavage Fluid of Patients With and Without Antibiotic Therapy
DOC.criteria: endotracheal intubation antibiotic therapy for 2 weeks OR no antibiotic therapy pregnancy immunodeficiency
